channel.title: Help with 508 urgent
channel.description:
KK im about to blow by head off :eek: cuz i cant get this to work.. anyways i just download tokkulscape v3.5 and i can get on using 127.0.0.1 and i just ran a 317 yesterday so portforwarding is not my problem and im the host, but my players are reporting that the client is getting stuck in Connecting to update the server. I also am receiving this problem on the other computer that i tried to connect with..
any helpp?? please i will pay you 10 dollars via profile if you can solve this for me. i am also available during team viewer if that will help
p.s i have changed all the no-ips in the files to my servers ip, but only i can connect via 127.0.0.1. please helppp/!? :confused:
